title: (x) Morley / secretly canadian logo type - Marbolo, similar to PAG Bankas {Andreas H, Tamas}
content:
Trying to locate the 2 typefaces of both of these logos.

Any suggestions much appreciated.

Many thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [morley\_logo\_300.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323040554/http:/typophile.com/files/morley_logo_300.jpeg) | 7.15 KB |
| [secretlytitle.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323040554/http:/typophile.com/files/secretlytitle.gif) | 8.45 KB |
author: iheartfinn

comments.content: The Morley logo is [Marbolo](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323040554/http:/www.searchfreefonts.com/free/marbolo-normal.htm) with a custom R.
[PAG Bankas](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323040554/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/prop-a-ganda/pag-bankas/) is close to the other one.
Thanks for the suggestions. Marbolo is perfect thanks Fontgrube, Thanks Atwe for the PAG Bankas suggestion, it's close but not quite right, do you think it is custom?
I honestly don't know, I have not checked through all the art deco fonts available out there, if you do a search on myfonts you may find an exact match.
Okay great, will have a search, thanks again!
